item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @mopar_sex_scape mopar sex scape
item.description:
@mopar_sex_scape wrote:

i was adding ring of stone on my 481 source and i want it to be npc 2626 i added it and compiled got no errors and when i make it on it goes on npc 0 it gets me hans not stone how i fix?

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583) { npcId = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
